meanings.definition: A single hypertext document on the World Wide Web that can incorporate text, graphics, audio, and video elements.
meanings.sent1: I found a lot of information on different webpages about animals.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy browsing through various webpages to learn new things.
meanings.sent3: The webpages about space made me feel like an astronaut!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a library full of colorful webpages waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: The webpages on cooking were so detailed, I could almost smell the food.

meanings.definition: The collection of interconnected webpages on the internet that are typically accessed through a web browser.
meanings.sent1: The webpages of the online store displayed a wide range of products.
meanings.sent2: I spent hours surfing through different webpages looking for travel deals.
meanings.sent3: The webpages seemed to be playing hide and seek with the information I needed.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like webpages, each leading to a different aspect of her life.
meanings.sent5: The webpages of the news website were constantly updated with the latest stories.
